column2: [Journal article: Multi-level conformal clustering: A distribution-free technique for clustering and anomaly detection](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0925231219316169)

column7: In this commercial application we developed a new data cleaning technique.
column8: It combines a rule-based machine learning technique called association rule mining with the conformal prediction framework. This allowed us to automatically identify likely errors in Centrica's SAP database which could then be manually corrected.
